Description.Text: Comwell Grand Park is a peaceful 4-star hotel offering high quality accommodation and facilities, within easy reach of Korsor town centre. Highlights include a gym, spa, indoor swimming pool and a restaurant. The hotel is situated in Halskov, the northern part of the port town, which is part of the Great Belt of Denmark. Flanked by Korsor golf club and Korsor town park, the hotel affords a peaceful atmosphere, complemented by its spacious grounds. Guests will find a variety of restaurants, bars and shops in the southern part of the town. Korsor train station is in the vicinity, offering fast and easy access to attractions across east Denmark. The hotel is made up of several interconnecting modern buildings, set out amongst lush green grounds. Facilities include a spa where guests can indulge in a range of beauty and massage treatments, an indoor swimming pool and tennis and volleyball equipment. Guests can also enjoy a game of golf at the 18-hole Korsor golf club next to the hotel. The restaurant offers a wide variety of Danish and European dishes. During warm weather dining is extended to the terrace. Standard rooms have a modern decor and boast a comfortable bed, armchairs, a desk and either a balcony or terrace. Amenities include a Bang & Olufsen flat-screen satellite TV, tea and coffee equipment and a hairdryer. Nintendo Wii consoles are available from reception. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Free parking is possible onsite.
